General.Name: Sagar Cements Limited
General.Description: Sagar Cements Limited manufactures and sells cement in India. The company offers ordinary Portland, Portland Pozzolana, sulphate resistant, and Portland slag cements, as well as ground granulated blast furnace slag under the Sagar brand. Sagar Cements Limited was incorporated in 1981 and is based in Hyderabad, India.
